Articles.Content: As the title says. I want it for Christmas so I want to know if it IS good. I am not looking for graphics but I just want what it offers. A TrackIR type head set. Also, can Headsets fit around it? Thanks!

As the title says. I want it for Christmas so I want to know if it IS good. I am not looking for graphics but I just want what it offers. A TrackIR type head set. Also, can Headsets fit around it? Thanks!

Yes, it's good. But wait until the retail version is out, it's going to be better, smaller, lighter and better.
